definition: to delineate/to draw a line/to underline
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: A simple compass is helpful for scribing the flowerpot cutouts.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单的指南针，是有助于划线的花盆切口。

sentences.english: Note: the heat shock consensus sequences are indicated by underscores.
sentences.chinese: 下划线表示热激保守序列。

sentences.english: Note that, here, the lifeline name is underlined.
sentences.chinese: 这里注意一点，生命线名称带下划线。

sentences.english: Hover the mouse over a section underlined in red.
sentences.chinese: 将鼠标停在红色下划线部分上。

sentences.english: Please post the original order form with a crossed cheque to the council.
sentences.chinese: 请再将已传真之表格正本连同划线支票邮寄至本协会。

sentences.english: The teacher crossed out several incorrect words in Tanya , s composition.
sentences.chinese: 老师将坦雅作文里几个用字不当的地方划线删除。

sentences.english: Find the best Chinese meaning of the underlined part.
sentences.chinese: 找出划线部分的最佳汉语释译。

sentences.english: By default, the separator is an underscore character.
sentences.chinese: 在默认情况下，分隔符是下划线字符。

sentences.english: Note the underlining of the validity error.
sentences.chinese: 注意打了下划线的有效性错误。

sentences.english: Cheques should be crossed and made payable to "Queen Self Storage Company Limited".
sentences.chinese: 支票应予划线，并注明支付“皇后自存仓有限公司”。

sentences.english: Choose the right sound of the underlined word.
Return the form and cheque by mail. Write the student's name on the back of the cheque.
sentences.chinese: 在划线支票背面写上姓名，連同表格寄回本公司。

sentences.english: Would you change the boldface terms, perhaps using italic or underlining?
sentences.chinese: 你会改变黑体字方面，可能使用斜体或下划线？
请在重要事项的下面划线。

sentences.english: Keep the red color, but get rid of the underlining and hover state.
sentences.chinese: 保持红色不变，但去除下划线和悬浮状态。

sentences.english: The tangled bine-stems scored the sky.
sentences.chinese: 纠缠的藤蔓在天上划线。

definition: to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
